Description: Rim sherd of pottery bowl; reddish Nile silt clay with much silver mica; interior: traces of beige-pink slip, also on rim; exterior: traces of beige-pink slip (much worn); inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (no.115)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IA.28)
